Fantasy 











 





Close shave
 




Vancouver's Trevor Linden celebrates after his goal.  (Getty Images)



    

    

      
      After a slow start, the Canucks break out for four goals against the Stars to win 4-1. 
      Stellar outings from Roberto Luongo and Marty Turco epitomize the tight 
      series, and it was too close to call 
      until the end, Wes Goldstein says.
    

  
 Related Links:• Stars' Zubov sits out | Series recaps: Game 1 | 2 | 3 | 4 | 5 | 6 | Matchup• Bracket | Expert Picks | Stats | Backhand Shots |  Watch! | Hey Wes!


 


 

 





 Pistons, Rockets handle business at home, go up 2-0


    

      
      Two series. Two eerily similar results. The Pistons and the Magic win 
      by the same score, moving to 2-0 in Round 1. Detroit beats 
      Orlando while Houston handles Utah.
    

  
• Rockets prevail | Matchups:  DET-ORL | UTA-HOU


 

 





 Chevy chase: Chevrolet drivers lead pack around track


    

      
      The gulf between Chevy and other makes are significant. Chevy drivers 
      are winning big and Brian De Los Santos says in his Power 
      Rankings that Chevrolet
 sets the pace.
    

  
• Zombie wins No. 76 | Johnson | Next up: Talladega
